Description:
Detects suspicious shell commands used in various Equation Group scripts and tools

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Equation Group Indicators
Query: sourcetype like 'linux-%' eql select * from _source_ where (log like '%chown root*chmod 4777 %' or log like '%cp /bin/sh .;chown%' or log like '%chmod 4777 /tmp/.scsi/dev/bin/gsh%' or log like '%chown root:root /tmp/.scsi/dev/bin/%' or log like '%chown root:root x;%' or log like '%/bin/telnet locip locport < /dev/console | /bin/sh%' or log like '%/tmp/ratload%' or log like '%ewok -t %' or log like '%xspy -display %' or log like '%cat > /dev/tcp/127.0.0.1/80 <<end%' or log like '%rm -f /current/tmp/ftshell.latest%' or log like '%ghost_* -v %' or log like '% --wipe > /dev/null%' or log like '%ping -c 2 *; grep * /proc/net/arp >/tmp/gx%' or log like '%iptables * output -p tcp -d 127.0.0.1 --tcp-flags rst rst -j drop;%' or log like '%> /var/log/audit/audit.log; rm -f .%' or log like '%cp /var/log/audit/audit.log .tmp%' or log like '%sh >/dev/tcp/* <&1 2>&1%' or log like '%ncat -vv -l -p * <%' or log like '%nc -vv -l -p * <%' or log like '%< /dev/console | uudecode && uncompress%' or log like '%sendmail -osendmail;chmod +x sendmail%' or log like '%/usr/bin/wget -o /tmp/a http* && chmod 755 /tmp/cron%' or log like '%chmod 666 /var/run/utmp~%' or log like '%chmod 700 nscd crond%' or log like '%cp /etc/shadow /tmp/.%' or log like '%</dev/console |uudecode > /dev/null 2>&1 && uncompress%' or log like '%chmod 700 jp&&netstat -an|grep%' or log like '%uudecode > /dev/null 2>&1 && uncompress -f * && chmod 755%' or log like '%chmod 700 crond%' or log like '%wget http*; chmod +x /tmp/sendmail%' or log like '%chmod 700 fp sendmail pt%' or log like '%chmod 755 /usr/vmsys/bin/pipe%' or log like '%chmod -r 755 /usr/vmsys%' or log like '%chmod 755 $opbin/*tunnel%' or log like '%chmod 700 sendmail%' or log like '%chmod 0700 sendmail%' or log like '%/usr/bin/wget http*sendmail;chmod +x sendmail;%' or log like '%&& telnet * 2>&1 </dev/console%')
